original_text: A person who has received some things will receive more things. Some other people have nothing. They will lose even the little bit that they do have.’
korean_text: 있는 자는 받을 것이요 없는 자는 그 있는 것까지도 빼앗기리라

sentences.original_text: A person who has received some things

sentences.korean_translation: 다른 어떤 사람들은 아무것도 가지고 있지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: They will lose even the little bit
